levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>+1</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{jesca2_s_3[def].def:0%}</>, Mobile Riot Shield gains <@ba.vup>+{jesca2_s_3_token[def].def:0%}</> DEF
When the Mobile Riot Shield is deployed, immediately fires a shell forward that explodes upon reaching a target or its max distance, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all enemies in an area and <$ba.stun>stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} Ammo, and the skill ends when all Ammo is used (can be manually deactivated)</>
